text: The European BioSafety Association (EBSA) is a non-profit organization, founded in June 1996, which provides a forum to its members to discuss and debate issues of concern and to represent those working in the field of biosafety and associated activities. Its mission is to enhance knowledge and understanding of biological safety throughout Europe and the rest of the world. ==Related pages== * Public health ==Other websites== * Category:1990s establishments in Belgium Category:1996 establishments in Europe Category:Medical and health organizations Category:Organizations based in Belgium
title: European BioSafety Association
